achievements: Developed in an Agile environment with bi-weekly sprints, ensuring continuous delivery and seamless integration of new features.

Engineered the frontend in NextJS/TypeScript with comprehensive testing, including unit, integration, and end-to-end tests in Jest.
Designed a multi-page direction system for route creation to concert venues, featuring input validation with Zod.js.

Developed and deployed a custom Discord bot to automatically forward important tutoring messages, including embedded links and attachments, from non-announcement channels to designated resource channels across multiple Discord servers.
Utilized discord.py to write the bot, leveraging asynchronous Python callbacks for real-time functionality, and ensured reliability through PyTest.
Implemented .env file authentication for simplified token management and enhanced security.
Mentored over 400 students across multiple 90-95 hour courses, helping them develop full-stack web applications using Python, Flask, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js.
Conducted daily live-coding sessions, improving coding proficiency by 40% and reducing coding errors by 30% through detailed feedback on quality and style.
Created 10 new lab assignments and exercises, leading to a 20% increase in student performance and advancing their preparedness for future courses by up to two weeks.
Streamlined the onboarding process for future tutors by developing comprehensive documentation and roadmaps, cutting preparation time by 50%.
Boosted student engagement by 25% through emotional support and mentorship, fostering a positive learning environment in both remote and hybrid settings.
Developed nationwide tracker that compiled and organized storage break-in patterns across US, improving reporting efficiency by 30% and facilitating data submission to law enforcement
Engineered a hands-free, contactless rental prototype during Covid-19 quarantine, increasing online rental conversions by  40% and enhancing customer safety
Generated monthly profit margin reports using Power Bi and Excel, improving financial decision-making across the district by 15% through enhanced reporting accuracy and insights
